data.title: Reviews of Secret Sunshine
data.text:
Most films tend to sensationalize, arguably even glamorize, the tragic and its aftermath, but not Secret Sunshine. This has been sitting on my shelf since last year, and today I finally loaded it up... all I can say, is that perhaps going in entirely unknowing was not the best idea but it definitely made it hit even harder.

The coldest moments play out without any of the traditional pomp and circumstance. There is no close-up of a grief stricken face,…

This is a film I'm finding it really difficult to come to grips with. At times it feels like it's about to walk over the line into misery porn, but it never quite does because Lee is too smart to let it. Horrible things happen one after the other, the suffering and indignity seems endless, and then at the lowest point of abject despair, we learn to live with it because the alternative is worse. Survival is the only way…

The Saints and Sinners from Miryang

"How dare God forgive him before I have a Chance to forgive him myself? Why would he do that to me? WHY?"

Wie kann man an einen Gott glauben, der einfach so Verbrechern vergibt, die einem selbst immenses Leid zugefügt haben bzw. Sünder von Sünden freispricht, bevor der oder die Ledtragenden den dadurch entstandenen Schmerz verarbeitet haben? Das größte Problem an Religion und dem Glauben allgemein ist meiner Meinung nach, dass jeder Mensch, ob…
